name: NETXP EQL User logged on multiple stations simultaneously
description: This rule detects instances where a user account is logged on to multiple stations simultaneously within a short timeframe. Such activity may indicate potential unauthorized access or misuse of user credentials and should be investigated promptly.
author: Szymon Gluch
query: (event.code : "4624" AND event.provider: "Microsoft-Windows-Security-Auditing") AND NOT user.name: ("SYSTEM" OR "USŁUGA SIECIOWA" OR "NETWORK SERVICE" OR "LOCAL SERVICE" OR "USŁUGA LOKALNA")
